(Simplified: 鲎)
Chinese Definition:
①節肢動物，甲殼類，生活在海中，尾堅硬，形狀像寶劍。肉可食：鱟帆(鱟腹部甲殼可以上下翹動，上舉時，稱“鱟帆”)。
②(鱟蟲)節肢動物。俗稱“水鱉子”、“王八魚”。
③方言，虹。
鱟魚 [ hòu yú ]: horseshoe crab (Tachypleus tridentatus)

鱟字的基本解释

鱟
hòu
见“鲎”。

鱟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hòu］
［《廣韻》胡遘切，去候，匣。］
［《廣韻》烏酷切，入沃，影。］
“鲎1”的繁体字。
(1)鲎鱼。又名中国鲎、东方鲎。节肢动物肢口纲，剑尾目，鲎科。全身分头胸部、腹部和尾部。头胸甲壳宽广，作半月形，俗呼为鲎帆。腹部甲壳呈六角形，尾部呈剑状，腹面有六双附肢。生活在海洋中。
(2)方言。虹。

鱟字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱟； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1478第40
【廣韻】胡遘切【集韻】下遘切，?音?。魚名。似蟹，有子可爲醬。【山海經註】鱟魚形如惠文冠，靑黑色，十二足，長五六尺，似蟹，雌常負雄，漁子取之，必得其雙。子如麻子，南人爲醬。【嶺表異錄】雄小雌大，水中雄者浮雌者沉。【左思·吳都賦】乗鱟黿鼉。又號鱟媚。【郭璞·江賦】蜦䗚鱟媚。又【廣韻】【集韻】?烏酷切，音沃。又【集韻】【正韻】?許?切，音詬。又【集韻】乙角切，音渥。義?同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hòu］
["Guangyun" Hu Dun cut, go to wait, box. ]
["Guangyun" Wuku cut, enter the world, and shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "鲎1".
(1) Horseshoe crab. Also known as Chinese horseshoe crab and oriental horseshoe crab. Arthropods, Limulus, Limulus, Limulus. The whole body is divided into head, chest, abdomen and tail. The head, chest and carapace are broad, shaped like a half moon, and are commonly called horseshoe crabs. The carapace on the abdomen is hexagonal, the tail is sword-shaped, and there are six pairs of appendages on the ventral surface. Live in the ocean.
(2) Dialects. rainbow.
horseshoe crab
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魎; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1478 40
[Guang Yun] Hu Yanqie [Jiyun] Xia Yunqie, "Yin?". The name of the fish. Like a crab, there are seeds for sauce. [Notes to Shanhaijing] The horseshoe crab is shaped like a Huiwen crown, is black, twelve-legged, five or six feet long, like a crab, and the female is often bearded. If a fisherman takes it, he must get the double. The child is like a pockmark, and the southerner is the sauce. [Different records of ridges and tables] The males are small and the females are big, and the males in the water float and the females sink. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Ride on horseshoe crabs and horseshoe crabs. Also called Li Mei. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Canthus and horseshoe crabs are charming. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu Kuqie, Yin Wo. Also 【Ji Yun】【Zheng Yun】? Xu? Cut, sound criticized. Also 【Jiyun】The second angle is cut, and the sound is wobbly. Righteous? Same.
